column4: Helo everybody, Im looking for some information about ubuntu, related with the users grow and the market penetration, any ideas?
what have you found by searching so far?
http://www.workswithu.com/2009/07/24/measuring-ubuntus-market-share/ discusses how one should even measure the market share.
i found 8 millions, Im writing a formal document and I need another formal document or study to quote it
